tweet: America’s elections are at the very core of our democracy. We must do all we can to ensure they truly represent the will of the people. Proud to know we’ve taken important steps in protecting our national security with passing the #SAFEAct last week. pic.twitter.com/IhZO9NKFn0

I’m proud that the House passed my bill, the #SAFEAct, to protect our elections from foreign attacks by updating our vulnerable & outdated voting systems. Now @Senatemajldr McConnell must put Americans first, and politics aside, by passing this important election security bill.

If #SCOTUS won’t fight to protect Americans’ votes, I will. Today I am reintroducing my bill that would end partisan gerrymandering by requiring all states to establish independent redistricting commissions to redraw lines that disenfranchise voters. https://cnn.it/2IVu5i9

Happy to join @SpeakerPelosi & @SenSchumer today to discuss the #SAFEAct, my bill to protect our elections from foreign interference.
